com.guidewire.pl.plugin.validation
Class ValidationResponse

java.lang.Object
  com.guidewire.pl.plugin.validation.ValidationResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
GWRemotable
public class ValidationResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements GWRemotable

The results of performing validation on a validatable entity such as a Claim, Exposure, or TransactionSet.

public ValidationResponse()
Method Detail

getValidationCommand

public ValidationCommand getValidationCommand()
The validation command. This is a required field.

setValidationCommand

public void setValidationCommand(ValidationCommand validationCommand)
The validation command. This is a required field.

getFieldValidationData

public FieldValidationData[] getFieldValidationData()
Stores validation data for a individual fields related to the entity being validated. All fields aren't necessarily directly on the entity being validated; they can be related through foreign keys and/or arrays.

If there are no field validation errors, then this returns an empty array.

setFieldValidationData

public void setFieldValidationData(FieldValidationData[] fieldValidationData)
Stores validation data for a individual fields related to the entity being validated. All fields aren't necessarily directly on the entity being validated; they can be related through foreign keys and/or arrays.

If there are no field validation errors, then this returns an empty array.

getGeneralValidationData

public GeneralValidationData[] getGeneralValidationData()
General validation exceptions related to the validated entity. These include exceptions across multiple fields or exceptions not related to a particular field.

If there are no general validation errors, then this returns an empty array.

setGeneralValidationData

public void setGeneralValidationData(GeneralValidationData[] generalValidationData)
General validation exceptions related to the validated entity. These include exceptions across multiple fields or exceptions not related to a particular field.

If there are no general validation errors, then this returns an empty array.
